author: TigreCapital
content: My wife's sister is in the ER (nothing major) I offer to get wife dinner. Me: "what do you want" Wife: "idk whatever you're in the mood for"

author: TigreCapital
content: @TheIpHawk absolutely, closely followed by are you too full for dessert I don't know if I am

author: TigreCapital
content: @ApexHurley I'd fund any app that would force her to input food preferences and output a place to eat

author: TigreCapital
content: @dimsumyoulose she literally like everything, not picky to a point

author: TigreCapital
content: @Nonrelatedsense yeah fortunately she's not picky at all. I maintain it would be easier if she was picky

author: TigreCapital
content: @FundyLongShort same here. I just try and memorize what she gets when she's by herself. I would get a burger every time
